description:
UPDATE: Scheduled price rise to $99 very soon.

“The problem is never the problem. The problem is that you don't even know how to think about the problem." – Dan Sullivan

Here is a question for you: does life happen to you, or for you? In other words, do all things work together for your ultimate good, or not? Many people perceive life as if it happens to them. Our challenge here is to start seeing it all as happening for us.

This course will enable you to:

  1. Develop a mind that is not in conflict with reality, a mind that in harmony with reality and uses all experiences to its great advantage and joy
  2. Have the emotional constitution that allows you to be at ease with and embrace your full range of emotions, giving you ultimate emotional freedom and strength, especially with emotions that used to scare you or trouble you before

Let me say again: this course will enable you to handle ANY mental challenges and ANY emotional challenges, but not by running or hiding or "getting rid" of them, but by embracing them in a way that adds power and growth to you, and brings you freedom and joy! It will make you bigger!

You will be able to achieve all this starting a mere 7 hours from now.

What's The Fuss All About?

So, you might ask, "What's the fuss all about?"

Well, there are several reasons people seem to like this material:

  • It's practical
  • It's simple
  • It's based on proven and time-tested principles and examples
  • Students who take it end up feeling better instantly and start to create tangible positive changes and experiences in their lives, instantly

Welcome!
title: Mind And Emotions Mastery & Freedom
